All Classes

Class Description
AddStudentGUI
The class AddStudentGUI from the View package will display all students from the application It will be also possible to create a student and update/delete an existing student
ColorMsg
This class is taking care of multiple enumeration color for different kind of situation to display a message
CrashView
Crash the application
DBConnection
Class that will take care of the database connection This class will create, delete, update, insert the Student and Module table
IGUI
Interface GUI - this interface is used to be able to create more easily the different class which implement this interfac
LauncherStudent
This class will take care of initializing the main classes needed to run the application properly
MainGUI
This class is the main GUI controller that will create multiple GUI pane
Module
The class Module that contains a name, a grade and the ID of the student that take this module
NameInfo
Class that will have the information of a person like his firstname and lastname and his fullname
Observer
The interface Observer will need to be implemented by the classes from the View package The classes from the Model package will call this method when it will be necessary to update the View GUI
RecordModuleGUI
For a student selected in a combobox, possibility to add a grade and a module, and it displays every module taken by the Student
SettingController
This class from is the main controller in the MVC application.
Student
The class Student will contain some information such as his name, date of birth and an ID
StudentManager
Use for JPA Student manager to add/delete/update a Student object
TemplateGUI
This method is used by all the GUI Window classes to share in one class partially redundant code, this will avoid duplicated code and too many lines of code The class which will want to use that class will need to extend it This class implement the Interface IGUI because it some methods of this class use the Controller and the BorderPane layout, so it will be easier that each class use the super() method to implement the two variables
University
The University class is the main class of the Model package.
ViewRecordGUI
Class that will display student information and their grades, user will have to select in a combobox a student to show his information
